== Kubuntu 13.10 to 14.04 LTS Upgrade ==

You will need to:
* Ensure 13.10 is updated.
* Run the release upgrade tool.
* Reboot.

=== Ensure 13.10 is Updated ===

1) Run Muon Update Manager.<<BR>>

<nowiki>[[File:raring1.png]]</nowiki>

----

2) Select '''Install Updates'''.<<BR>>

<nowiki>[[File:raring2.png]]</nowiki>

----

3) Restart Muon Update Manager, you will be notified for updates.<<BR>>
<nowiki>[[File:upgrade-muon.png]]</nowiki>

or<<BR>>
3) You will be prompted for an upgrade, click the gear icon in the systray. <<BR>>

<nowiki>[[File:upgrade-notify.png]]</nowiki>

----

4) Enter your password.<<BR>>

----
5) The upgrade tool will start.<<BR>>

<nowiki>[[File:distupgrade_saucy.png]]</nowiki>

If you do not get the above window, and instead get a message about "No Update found" you can force an upgrade by pressing '''Alt-F2''' and run '''do-release-upgrade'''.<<BR>>

----

6) Confirm that you want to start the upgrade.<<BR>>

<nowiki>[[File:start_upgrade_saucy.png]]</nowiki>

----

7) It will download and install the new release; have some coffee.<<BR>>

<nowiki>[[File:gettting_packages_saucy.png.png]]</nowiki>

----

8) The last step of the entire process is to reboot your machine.<<BR>>

<nowiki>[[File:restart_saucy.png]]</nowiki>

== Welcome to Kubuntu 14.04 LTS ==
If everything went smoothly after the upgrade and the reboot, your desktop should look like the following: <<BR>>

<nowiki>[[File:raring11.png]]</nowiki>
